designs.name: Hotel Luxury Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Elegant hotel-style bedroom offering comfort and refined luxury for guests
designs.flooring: Engineered wooden flooring with soft area rug
designs.walls: Neutral beige walls with upholstered accent panel
designs.ceiling: Simple false ceiling with warm cove lighting
designs.furniture: Queen size bed, bedside tables, wardrobe, luggage bench
designs.decor: Abstract artwork, premium bedding, decorative cushions
designs.prompt_keywords: hotel style guest bedroom, luxury neutral interiors, elegant comfort

designs.name: Modern Minimal Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Clean, clutter-free bedroom designed for calm and relaxation
designs.lighting: Warm LED ceiling lights, bedside sconces
designs.furniture: Platform bed, slim bedside tables, compact wardrobe
designs.decor: Single art piece, minimal cushions, light curtains
designs.prompt_keywords: modern minimal guest bedroom, clean simple design, peaceful space

designs.name: Cozy Scandinavian Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Warm and welcoming bedroom with Scandinavian simplicity
designs.walls: Soft white walls with wood accents
designs.furniture: Wooden bed, side tables, storage bench
designs.decor: Textured throws, indoor plants, framed prints
designs.prompt_keywords: scandinavian guest bedroom, cozy natural interiors, warm minimal

designs.name: Classic Traditional Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Timeless and elegant bedroom with classic detailing
designs.walls: Soft cream walls with classic moldings
designs.furniture: Wooden bed, carved bedside tables, wardrobe
designs.decor: Traditional artwork, table lamps, patterned cushions
designs.prompt_keywords: classic guest bedroom, traditional interiors, elegant timeless design

designs.name: Boho Relaxed Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Casual and artistic bedroom with bohemian charm
designs.walls: Neutral walls with boho wall hangings
designs.ceiling: Simple ceiling with woven pendant light
designs.furniture: Low bed, wooden side tables, open wardrobe
designs.prompt_keywords: boho guest bedroom, relaxed artistic interiors, casual comfort

designs.name: Urban Modern Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Sleek urban-style bedroom with contemporary appeal
designs.flooring: Dark wood or concrete finish flooring
designs.walls: Grey tones with textured accent wall
designs.furniture: Queen bed, metal side tables, sliding wardrobe
designs.prompt_keywords: urban modern guest bedroom, contemporary city style

designs.name: Coastal Light Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Fresh and breezy bedroom inspired by coastal living

designs.name: Luxury Contemporary Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Premium modern bedroom with elegant finishes

designs.prompt_keywords: luxury contemporary guest bedroom, modern premium design

designs.name: Nature Organic Guest Bedroom
designs.description: Natural, calming bedroom inspired by organic materials
